turkish_example_sentence: Siz o lüks yatla sahip olmamışsanız, Akdeniz'de seyranedemezdiniz.
english_example_sentence: If you had not owned that luxury yacht, you could not have sailed in the Mediterranean.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы вы не владели тем роскошным яхтом, вы не смогли бы плавать в Средиземном море.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz o lüks yatla ______, Akdeniz'de seyranedemezdiniz.
